text: Kim Eui-sung (; born December 17, 1965) is a South Korean actor. He starred in movies such as The Day a Pig Fell into the Well (1996), Office (2015), The Exclusive: Beat the Devil's Tattoo (2015) and Train to Busan (2016). He also appears in the TV series W (2016). ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean actors
title: Kim Eui-sung
